dojo4/competition-at-its-best.title: competition at its best
dojo4/competition-at-its-best.author: corey@dojo4.com
dojo4/competition-at-its-best.body:
There’s actually a real strategic advantage to embracing our competitors. It makes our jobs more interesting, hones the quality of our work and builds a more impactful and innovative economic landscape. Here’s a quick snippet of me talking about it for a project created by Hub Boulder about creating change:

There’s some other great “bite-sized insights from the community of social entrepreneurs, start-ups, impact investors, non-profit leaders, and other professionals haunting the halls and common spaces at HUB Boulder” produced by TakeOne Creative at http://takeonecreative.com/change-in-60-seconds, with friends like Praful Shah and Emily Davis.
